text:
Inserting myself in here in case I'm wrong.

I don't think that capability exists. HubSpot has a feature called memberships where you can manage user authentication on their blog, landing, and website pages. That may not be what you're looking for.

<https://www.HubSpot.com/products/cms/memberships>
When POSTing a form to HubSpot API, what's the format for a select field? I tried just name and value. The fetch is giving me an error. Anyone know what the proper JSON is?

Hi <@U01B10S09FU>
This article might help you
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/module-theme-fields#choice>
